company.name: Green Studio 9
company.tagline: We are a creative & performance-driven studio helping brands grow through powerful content, smart ads, and seamless automation.
company.description: From cinematic visuals to fully automated workflows - we bridge creativity and strategy to make marketing actually work.

services.name: Media Production
services.description: We produce cinematic visuals and branded content that doesn't just look good – it performs. From concept to post-production, our creative team handles every stage with precision and storytelling that converts attention into engagement.
services.whyItMatters: Visuals are your first impression - and we make sure it's unforgettable. We don't shoot content for likes; we shoot content that drives results.

services.name: Photography
services.description: We shoot professional visuals that tell your story through light, color, and emotion - whether it's products, people, or events.
services.whyItMatters: A single image can define how your audience perceives your brand. We make every shot count.

services.name: Reels Production
services.description: Complete reel production packages for social media.

services.name: Video Editing
services.description: We turn raw footage into scroll-stopping, polished videos ready for any platform. Each edit is tailored to your brand's tone and objectives.
whatIncluded: Editing, color grading, and sound design
Formats optimized for each platform (Reels, YouTube, Ads, etc.)
services.whyItMatters: Editing isn't just cutting clips - it's crafting a rhythm that keeps viewers watching till the end.

services.name: Media Buying
services.description: We plan, execute, and optimize paid ad campaigns that actually deliver ROI – not just vanity metrics. Our team runs data-driven campaigns across Meta, Google, and TikTok, testing every variable to ensure you get the most out of your ad spend.
whatIncluded: Full campaign setup and audience research
services.whyItMatters: Because impressions don't pay the bills - conversions do. We focus on results that you can measure in sales, leads, and growth.

pricing.model: Custom - based on campaign goals and monthly ad spend
pricing.note: We charge a % management fee or a fixed retainer depending on your budget

services.name: Automation
services.description: We connect your tools, build custom workflows, and automate repetitive tasks so your business runs smoothly - 24/7. Think Zapier, CRMs, bots, and full integration between platforms.
whatIncluded: Custom bots for chat, email, and data handling
services.whyItMatters: Smart automation saves time, reduces human error, and lets your team focus on growth instead of manual work.

services.name: Automation for Enterprises
services.description: We design enterprise-level automation systems that integrate marketing, sales, and operations into one seamless ecosystem.
services.whyItMatters: Scalable automation gives enterprises the flexibility to move fast, adapt quickly, and operate efficiently.

pricing.model: Custom - contact us for enterprise automation solutions

services.name: Web Development & Design
services.description: We create fast, modern, and conversion-optimized websites that turn visitors into loyal customers. Every website we build is a perfect blend of design, performance, and strategy.
whatIncluded: Integration with CRMs, e-commerce, and analytics tools
services.whyItMatters: Your website is your digital storefront - we make sure it's open, attractive, and built to convert.

services.name: E-commerce Stores
services.description: We build and scale e-commerce stores ready to sell from day one. Whether it's Shopify, WooCommerce, or custom setups, we handle everything from product uploads to checkout optimization.
services.whyItMatters: An e-commerce site should do more than look good – it should make buying effortless and build trust instantly.

services.name: Social Media Management
services.description: We manage, plan, and grow your brand presence across social media platforms. From strategy to content creation, we build communities that engage and convert.
services.whyItMatters: Social media is more than just posting - it's storytelling, consistency, and brand experience. We make your brand impossible to ignore.

pricing.note: Depending on number of platforms and posting frequency

services.name: Product-Focused Video Production Package
services.description: A complete content production package designed for brands that want professional, high-converting product videos — without needing to appear on camera. We handle everything from creative ideas to shooting, scriptwriting, editing, and delivering ad-ready content.
services.tagline: You don't have to appear on camera to sell. Your product will do the talking — and we'll handle the storytelling, shooting, and editing.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for small products + simple shoots

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Ideal for ads + social media content

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: For brands looking for cinematic, ad-ready hero content

services.name: Script Writing
services.description: We craft engaging scripts that deliver your message clearly and emotionally. Whether it's ads, reels, or podcasts - we make your words sell.
whatIncluded: Copywriting for short- and long-form video
services.whyItMatters: A strong script is the foundation of every successful video. It's not just what you say – it's how you make people feel.

services.name: Event Coverage
services.description: We capture your events with cinematic storytelling - blending photography and video to highlight every moment that matters.
services.whyItMatters: Events come and go - but the right coverage keeps their impact alive long after the lights go off.

services.name: Podcast Production
services.description: Professional podcast production services with multiple camera setups and comprehensive post-production.
